examples.example: 我在机场满怀期待地迎接远方来的朋友。

translate.english: I was at the airport, looking forward to welcoming friends coming from afar.

examples.example: 我兴高采烈地赶到机场去迎接出差归来的父母。

translate.english: I went to the airport happily to welcome my parents who returned from a business trip.

examples.example: 我愉快地前往机场，准备开始一段精彩的旅程。

translate.english: I happily went to the airport, ready to start a wonderful journey.
